website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy water ionizer machine with seven settings and antioxidant-boosting technology.
pros: More powerful than some other options

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: It has only been two days, I will be back with an update, but I’ve been drinking the water on the drinking setting, haven’t really felt a difference in myself yet, but I just tried the cleaning setting on my stove top for some egg that got on it while I was cooking, I waited for it to cool and then used the cleaning acidic water to test the water and while it cleaned it a little, it didn’t take much of the egg resin off, then my mom used to chemical product she usually cleans the stove top with and it came off immediately. So right now I am very unsure of this water ionizer
customer_reviews.author: Sam n

customer_reviews.title: drink healthy water is vital to our health
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my ionizer water filter for about 2 months. Easy to install and work. The water tastes so much better.... and so much healthier drinking at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: sonya graske

customer_reviews.title: How to make selections.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that it's constantly cycling and stuck on the WASH cycle, although it is not getting that much use. I find that making my selections by touching the choices does not respond. Our Athena seemed to get low reviews, but ours had lasted perfectly for almost 15 years. I am sorry we switched, and It's too late to return it. Not at all happy with this water filter.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Gacek

customer_reviews.title: Not at all Happy with this lemon.
customer_reviews.text: I try to make water for my water cooler and after a day the water taste funny. I have an Enagic and that doesn’t happen. The fittings are not that of easily found parts. I had to get a plumber in here and he even went to the OEM and got nothing. He made the fittings needed. When I turn on the water, most of the time the ionizer doesn’t come on. I have measured the water to see if it was working anyway and just wasn’t displaying but it was not working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It took me a week to get it installed i wanted to send it back after i couldnt hook it to my faucet..I really wanted that good refreshing taste that my mothers machine has but i guess i got what i payed for
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to install and use. Half the price of a Kangan and a better warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good water and good price
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase so far. I had been interested for a while now to buy a water system but could not bring myself to spend thousands of dollars on other popular models. When I visited my brother he introduced me to this one and I quickly decided to buy it for all the great qualities it offers plus the price is so half compared to Kanggan Machine. I am loving the water I’m drinking, it’s given me more energy and I’m sleeping better. Plus I love the beauty water function, I really like to use it to wash my face, it leaves my skin very clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Linnett

customer_reviews.title: They have great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after experiencing alkaline water with a machine my friend bought. I noticed immediate increase in energy. Since I bought this machine I have also been sleeping better and my joints hurt less.
customer_reviews.author: cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: For over 1 month now....
customer_reviews.text: We are very particular about our water. We live on-the-road, full-time, in a 40ft. travel trailer. Prior to getting the Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.5, we would find water stores in each city we visited. Our schedule was a new city every 3-7 days. Sometimes we would find a water store with high ph water....but not always, and then just the RO outside of grocery stores! We went with the Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.5 and have been using it exclusively for the last month....it is amazing! We love the water for cooking, cleaning, drinking!!!! The taste is wonderful. We couldn't be happier. Do your self a favor - get one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DREAM

customer_reviews.title: Grateful for clean healthy water
customer_reviews.text: We love our new water system. It has various settings on it that we can change depending on what we need the water for. Our bodies are thanking us as well. We feel healthier and are so grateful for clean water. Our plants are thriving too. We water them with the acidic water and they seem to be loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy water
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this water ionizer. Me and my whole family consistently use this. There are many different settings depending on what we want the water for. I feel much healthier and my daughters love to use the beauty water to wash their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great alkaline ionizer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ionizer. I considered buying a Kangen machine but was put off by the price ($5000.00!) Bought the 9.5 for much, much less and because of the excellent warranty. Works great, I use it every day for cooking and the antioxidant setting for drinking. I have spoken 2 times to customer service (a live person!) because of questions I had without waiting on the phone. I recommend this machine if you are looking for an alkaline machine. Steve S.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.5 unit along with premium package from Real Spirit USA. I had lots of questions and Mason was able to answer all. The unit works flawlessly and we installed the faucet the unit is under the sink. It is very convenient. We drink the anti-oxidant setting water all the time now and we have found it helps with our digestion and regularity and quenches our thirst better than bottled drinking water. We use the cleaning mode to clean our stainless steel appliances, marble counter tops and even my glasses. No streaks and cuts the grease. It is amazing how well it works. If you are thinking about an anti-oxidant machine, I suggest this one.
customer_reviews.author: cece tsou

customer_reviews.title: Specifications - Purpose - Installation - Operation: Easy and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with our new Air Water Life Deluxe 9.5 machine. We use it for all consumed water, including tea, coffee, cooking, and drinking. Food is more delicious and seems to cook more quickly. Best coffee I ever made :) Also for laundry, household cleaning, and bathing. Clothes come out softer, skin is clearer. I have a medical condition and the water has improved my symptoms. Very Happy and Highly Recommended. Also, Support Staff is Very Helpful to answer questions and resolve problems (we have a strange size faucet)
customer_reviews.author: The Gardener

customer_reviews.title: The Aqua Ionizer Deluxe is worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: I never noticed that my tap water had a taste until I started drinking bottled Alkaline water, now my water tastes as fresh as the bottled water I used to buy. I enjoy how many settings the Aqua Ionizer deluxe has, and I use them all regularly. The machine fits nicely in my kitchen and is very user friendly. I had to get a new faucet to be able to use the Aqua Ionizer Deluxe, as it will not attach to sinks that have a pull down spout. Make sure you have the right faucet before you buy the machine. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Melody Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have had other water alkalizes before, but none compare! From the purchase to my fist cup of water it has been 5 stars. The experience was easy to shop with the outstanding customer service, thanks Mason! The product is solid! Easy to use, easy to install, small and simple. This powerhouse delivers water that is exceptional. I love the taste and the simplicity to change between alkalinity levels as well as my acidic water for plants and antioxidant for my health. Thank you we are customers for life! Terrie H.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine is very easy to use; it's intuitive and is very quiet when dispensing water or cleaning itself. I tested the water with pH paper, and it seems to operate as claimed. Note: Rather than hook it up myself (I'm not real mechanical), I paid a plumber 150 dollars to plumb it from my basement. This was well worth it... very clean look, nothing connected to my faucet. It takes up little space on my counter and overall I'm quite happy with it. Also, support was good, very friendly.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We all are so pleased with the results, feeling better after just two weeks. Ionized water helps with energy, digestion, mental clarity, endurance, restful sleep. It has transformed our health. Very good customer support and highly recommend this unit to all our friends.
customer_reviews.author: TUAN TRAN

customer_reviews.title: It works fine with a RO system, be sure to add some minerals
customer_reviews.text: I have a RO system under the sink to which I have added a remineralization stage. I have hooked the Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.5 without any filter (since the water coming from the RO system is pure and with the right amount of minerals for the ionization to occur) and the results are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Costel L Gheorghe

customer_reviews.title: Love this water system!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does my tap water taste better, but I am super hydrated. And the best part is that I almost spent $4700 on a very similar system when I discovered this one - which is just as good but a fraction of the price. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: maggie casola

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes wonderful and is helping our family to be healthy even our cocker spaniel. Very easy to install. I really like the 32 oz water bottles. They measure the water and I love the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Laura c

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for 2 months now and no problems at all. Very easy to install. Great instructions and tech support. Water ph tests right where it should. We opted for the LED faucet and it matches our other faucets nicely. Only negative is we don't have much use for the acidic "waste" water - but that's an issue with all ionizers.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality, easy filter replacement, nice added extras
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order from Air Water Life. I have had other ionizer machines but would strongly recommend this product. From the ordering process to the delivery, everything was smooth. We had a FedEx issue that was quickly and easily resolved. This is my second product (got one for my daughter) and we love it. The filter change is easy and seamless. The under counter choice was also a great improvement for us. I would order from Air Water Life again. They have a good product and we have had others, but none compare.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy path to healthy gut
customer_reviews.text: The Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.5 and reservoir tank were as easy to assemble as the videos stated that are on their website. No time at all hooked up and ready to use. I love it and it's healthy for you. Healthy gut healthy life!! Also like to note the sales/tech staff will answer any and all questions you may have before and after your purchase. They are great!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Wyble

product_meta.title: Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.5 Anti-Oxidant Boost Water Ionizer | Alkaline Water Filtration System | Produces pH 3.0-11.5 Alkaline Water | Up to -880mV ORP | 4000 Liters Per Filter | 7 Water Settings
feature_bullets: High Anti-Oxidants: The Antioxidant Deluxe Machine uses proprietary antioxidant boost technology to dramatically increase the number of antioxidants, specifically molecular hydrogen, in your water.
7 Healthy Water Options: 4 ionized alkaline continuously variable; 1 non-ionized purified; 2 ionized acidic presets.
Advanced 9-Electroplate Technology: 9 platinum coated titanium, long-life, durable, energy-efficient plates.
Additional Features: Fully variable 3.0 to 11.5 pH; OPR Range +600 to -880mV; intuitive backlit LCD, Lifetime warranty.
Self-Cleaning: Unit cleans itself by reversing the polarity after each use and auto-plate washing itself every 10.5 gal

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
